TITLE Chipotle Pork Avocado Wrap

# Pre-heat oven to 350F. Trim [1 lbs pork tenderloin] and rub with [salt] and [pepper]. Roast until internal temperature reaches 135. Let rest.

{[avocado sauce]
# While pork is roasting combine [0.5 cup [mashed] avocado], [1.5 tbl mayonaise], [1 tsp lime juice], [2 tsp [chopped] chipotle chiles in adobo sauce], [0.25 tsp salt], [0.25 tsp ground cumin], [0.25 tsp dried oregano]. Stirring well.
}

# Slice pork and serve on [4 item 8-inch flour tortillas] with $[avocado sauce], [spinach] and [salsa].
